inputs.name: SMB Server Address
inputs.help_text: Enter the SMB server's IP address or hostname.

inputs.name: Authentication Method
inputs.help_text: Select the authentication method for the SMB server.

inputs.name: Polling Interval
inputs.help_text: Specify the polling interval in minutes.

actions.description: Allows the user to add a new SMB collector to the Profiler.
Allows the user to modify the configuration of an existing SMB collector.
Allows the user to remove an SMB collector from the Profiler.

constraints.constraint: SMB Server Address must be a valid IP address or hostname.
Polling Interval must be between 1 and 1440 minutes.

errors.resolution: Ensure the SMB Server Address is a valid IP or hostname.
Set the Polling Interval between 1 and 1440 minutes.

steps: Navigate to Profiler > Collectors > SMB Collector.
Enter SMB Server Address, Authentication Method, and Polling Interval.
Navigate to Profiler > Collectors > SMB Collector.
Modify the required fields such as SMB Server Address or Polling Interval.
